says: Virtual Infant and Child First Aid Awareness is ideal for those who are interested in learning more about first aid for children and infants. It is not a CSA approved course and is purely for educational purposes and includes 45 minutes of online, self-lead videos.
Topics covered: Emergency scene management, Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Automated external defibrillators (AED) for children and infants, Heart, breathing and stroke related emergencies
